item.title: Daily logs
item.description: This is my first post Day 27/4/2021 –Tuesday Ubuntu is my Cupid sudo apt-get update sudo apt upgrade Date:28/4/2021 –Wednesday ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C “abc@gmail.com” eval “$(ssh-agent -s)” ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa pbcopy < ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub or cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub (then copy the content)
